name: Starwatch
description:
Starwatch: A 2D metroidvania platformer inspired by Mario Galaxy and Hollow Knight
Created for Metroidvania Month Jam 16

Controls:

A - Left

D - Right

W/Space - Jump

Left Click - Shoot laser

Escape - Pause

Backspace - Quit (Don't ask lol)

Unlocks: Grapple Hook

Right Click to hook onto grapple points

Drill

Press E to break dirt and bounce on enemies

Lightning

Press Q to unleash a massive thunderbolt

Credits:

Just me
